short.name: Glowshot Karaoke Tram
short.description: A neon-lit karaoke streetcar loops Kreuzberg while serving radioactive-looking cocktails.

short.name: The Spree Plunge
short.description: A 5-minute cold-dip pop-up in the river followed by instant espresso and group screaming.

short.name: Philosopher's Ping Pong
short.description: You lose a point every time you answer a question without citing Kant.

short.name: Techno Yoga Warmup
short.description: 40-minute Vinyasa under strobe lights, cued by a live DJ and someone whispering 'Surrender.'

short.name: Bauhaus Bootcamp
short.description: A design-themed HIIT class where instructors shout about symmetry and function over form.

short.name: The Apology Booth
short.description: Record an anonymous voicemail apology to your ex. It's broadcast on low-range FM.

short.name: Elevator Exhibition
short.description: 4-minute micro-art gallery inside a glass elevator. One ride only. No looping.

short.name: Dumpster Cheese Tasting
short.description: 'Sourced' from Berlin's eco scene; hosted by a very sincere man named Lutz.

short.name: Zine Speed-Dating
short.description: Trade self-published zines with strangers. No talking allowed. Judging is encouraged.

short.name: Late Capitalism Bingo
short.description: Spot ironic tattoos, unpaid interns, and startup founders in a curated Neukölln cafe.

short.name: Underwear Portrait Studio
short.description: 15-minute B&W film portraits taken in a drafty warehouse. Everyone's in their socks.

short.name: Cloud Bar
short.description: A rooftop with only water vapor, ASMR playlists, and zero drinks. You leave thirstier.

short.name: Berliner Bear-Hug Booth
short.description: One euro for 30 seconds of aggressive but affirming hugging from a man in a bear suit.

short.name: Rum Trader
short.description: Iconic, tiny bar where cocktails are sacred and phones are frowned upon.

short.name: Green Door
short.description: Retro speakeasy with velvet wallpaper and a bell you have to ring to enter.

short.name: Becketts Kopf
short.description: Literary-themed cocktail bar with deep vibes and old books behind the liquor.

short.name: Vabali Spa Happy Hour Sauna
short.description: A quick post-work sweat and plunge just west of Hauptbahnhof.

short.name: Clärchens Ballhaus Front Garden
short.description: Grab a quick spritz and hear accordion music in a 1913 dance garden.

short.name: Tempelhofer Feld
short.description: Join the 7pm joggers and kiteboarders on a decommissioned airport runway.

short.name: Bar Tausend
short.description: Hidden under the S-Bahn tracks, with brutalist design and pre-dinner DJ sets.

short.name: Mini Elvis Off
short.description: Guests get one minute to out-Elvis each other. Winner gets a peanut butter martini.

short.name: Slot Machine Confessional
short.description: Pull the lever, hear a stranger's darkest secret, leave with a drink token.

short.name: Drive-Thru Compliment Tunnel
short.description: You're slowly driven through a glowing tunnel of actors giving you absurd praise.

short.name: Desert Limo Drift
short.description: Strap in for a high-speed limo donut session in a sand lot outside the Strip.

short.name: Bubble Gun Rodeo
short.description: Shoot biodegradable bubbles at robot clowns while riding a slow-moving bull.

short.name: Slot-Size Escape Room
short.description: You and a partner have 5 minutes to get out of a velvet-walled gambling closet.

short.name: Neon Haiku Bar
short.description: You only get served if you order your drink in perfect haiku form.

short.name: Cirque du Snack
short.description: Watch a 10-minute snack-themed acrobat set while eating popcorn on a podium.

short.name: Silent Slot Lounge
short.description: No sound. Just you, plush headphones, and machines that whisper affirmations.

short.name: Champagne Pong
short.description: Pairs play pong with flutes and foam. Winner takes the bottle, loser gets sprayed.

short.name: Velvet Tarot Drive-Up
short.description: Get a two-card reading while parked behind a velvet curtain near the Strip.

short.name: The Bribe Table
short.description: Sit at a circular table and try to bribe your way into dessert service.

short.name: Selfie Courtroom
short.description: Be judged for your Instagram crimes in a 5-minute mock trial with wigs.

short.name: Velveteen Rabbit
short.description: Trendy bar known for creative drinks, cozy interior, and backyard patio.

short.name: SkyBar at Waldorf Astoria
short.description: Chic rooftop with stunning Strip views and refined drink menu.

short.name: Atomic Liquors
short.description: Oldest freestanding bar in Vegas with retro charm and rooftop patio.

short.name: The Laundry Room
short.description: Secret entrance, strict reservations, and seriously artistic cocktails.

short.name: AREA15 Art Walk
short.description: Pop into art installations and wild shops at Vegas' immersive culture hub.

short.name: Fremont Street Zipline
short.description: Fly across Fremont under neon lights in under 2 minutes of screaming fun.

short.name: The Chandelier at Cosmopolitan
short.description: Have a quick cocktail inside a literal crystal chandelier.

short.name: Shibuya Crossing
short.description: World's busiest pedestrian crossing with amazing people-watching.
